There are many things on my table.
There is a computer screen, a keyboard, and a mouse.
There is a brown speaker beside my computer screen.
It is cheap, but I like its design.
And can you see the small green toy under my computer screen?
It's cute, so I put it there.
There is also a lamp beside my computer screen, on the other side.
It is expensive, but I like it a lot, so I bought it.
